short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can synthesize a video file with background music by uploading audio and video files and adjusting the parameters on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can easily synthesize the video or image you want by adjusting the page parameters. You can upload video and audio files, use the audio as background music for the video, and adjust the length of the video as desired.
